website_summaries.verdict: These tests might be pricier, but they take the guess work out of ovulation testing. Just look for the smiley face.
pros: Detects the two most fertile days in your cycle
Test strip reader provides the results for you so you don't have to interpret the darkness of the lines yourself
cons: These are much pricier than the regular strips, but are definitely easier to use

customer_reviews.title: Works on males as well
customer_reviews.text: After 12 days of "high fertility" I finally had my husband pee on a stick. Apparently he has "high fertility" as well. So sick of this blinking smiley face. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kara S Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: This product worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! We didn't use this product until the 2nd cycle of trying, and after a few weeks of testing every other day, I got a smiley face 2 days in a row. My phone apps were off by a day or two. And today I tested with the First Response and found out I'm pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Poof Ball

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after only using these for 3 months, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Pregnant after only using these for 3 months, and I'm 38, husband is 46! Had tried with just an app and temperature for a YEAR before w/out any results.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pregnant after 1 month using, 6 months trying before this kit. I had things pinpointed but this kit told me to bump a few days early. I listen and voila! we had an extra Christmas present this year!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ACCURATE. WORKED ON THE FIRST MONTH!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!! My husband and I bought these after trying for a baby for 5 months! I was previously using an app and my own calculations to track when I was ovulating. These tests determined I was ovulating 4 days before I thought I was!! I got a smiley on my first test... needless to say it worked and we now have a box of these tests we no longer need!
customer_reviews.author: k1234

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. I used it for two months but ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I used it for two months but only last month it gave me a smiley face. Maybe I wasn.t ovulating last cycle. I tried it on friday and no smiley face, then next day there it was and sunday too: Day 16 and 17 on my cycle. I followed the instructions and today I learned I'm 4 weeks pregnant !! I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ali escobar

customer_reviews.title: Can’t trust.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packages and after using for couple weeks, came to conclusion that it does not work. As you can see in the pictures with the same sample of urine it shows two different results and this has been since I received both of them. One only shows the blank circle and the other only shows they smiley flashing face. In other words, I believe both of them is in accurate and I have no idea if I actually ovulated this month or not. The pictures are from two different test, taken in two different dates. Since the first time, it shows the same results. This is a lot of money spent on nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False result
customer_reviews.text: This never caught my LH surge. I tested the morning before I went to my Dr’ office. It actually showed low fertile window and this was my day 13. I went to my Dr’s office same day for blood work and got a call back in about 2 hours that I am surging. My LH was 35 and E2 was 250. He recommended that I give myself my trigger shot immediately as my ovulation would happen in less than 24 hours. So I was really disappointed that I paid so much for these and still couldn’t even predict my fertile window and not to talk of my peak.
customer_reviews.author: Eseoghene Otobo

customer_reviews.title: This thing will get you pregnant
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this after we had tried for 8 months to get pregnant. We never even opened the package and after one week of owning this test she got pregnant. I don't know what more you could ask for! You don't even have to use the test and you'll have a baby in no time. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wells

customer_reviews.title: For me I like that they give a for sure answer and there ...
customer_reviews.text: I think these tests are all about timing. I took one in the morning and it was negative, then one about 2pm and it was positive. Took another in the eve before bed and it was negative. I had been tracking my ovulation for several months prior to buying these and became pregnant with one months use of these tests. For me I like that they give a for sure answer and there is no guessing.
customer_reviews.author: patience

customer_reviews.title: All The One Star Reviews Are For a Reason
customer_reviews.text: Update/Correction: I thought My surgeon who untied my tubes recommended this test to me, but he was recommending the regular Lcear Blue Digital. Said this one was a rip-off. After nine days of high fertility I gave up. Don't waste your time. I am currently on day 7 of high fertility (the blinking smiley) and am calling shennanigans. The tester supposedly gets to know you or whatever, but it doesn't appear that you can just buy replacement test strips. Don't set yourself up for disappointment, find something else. 99% accurate - my ***.
customer_reviews.author: KateCME

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Digital Ovulation test, but when my fertility window started I open the box and it wasnt the digital one.. it was the stick, the one that I dont even know how to interpret. The thing is the box says its the digital one, this is a scam. I tried to use it but I dont even know if it works.. so this month I wont be able to track my ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Mosquea

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: We have been TTC for a little over 2 years and have been unsuccessful. I have used an app and those other tests where you have to guess if your sticks are dark enough. I bought this test, peed on it everyday until I got a happy face, only DTD on that happy face day. I took a pregnancy test yesterday and it's positive.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use if you follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. If you read and follow the directions, it’s a no brainer. Also, when you’re testing, dip for 15 seconds (count one Mississippi, two Mississippi, three Mississippi, etc, etc.) and then wait for 5 minutes. This is my first cycle using them but I had one day of low fertility, three days of high fertility, and then my peak fertility which stayed on for 48 hours. I’ll update later if I get pregnant. Either way, it was comforting to know that I am in fact ovulating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped Me Get Pregnant
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver while trying to get pregnant! I got pregnant after 2 months of use, 3 months total of trying. It really helps to know when your fertile window is.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely did not work out they way it was supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not work out they way it was supposed to, so frustrating. My husband and I are trying to conceive and this little number did not work as intended and then basically had the nerve to tell me (via instructions) that I had to purchase more ovulation sticks just to see if the actual tester even worked. That definitely pissed me off. Thankfully amazon allowed me refund since the item was sold out and couldn't be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvz

customer_reviews.title: I reccomend for anyone who doesn't have a normal cycle
customer_reviews.text: ***update... I got pregnant after 1 try. Well worth the money*** My cycle is anywhere from 35-40 days so I got this kit to help figure out when I ovulate (duh). The instructions say that if you see high fertility but don't see a peak in ovulation within 9 days stop testing. I didn't stop testing (because I'm stubborn) and my peak happened on day 13. I did the test every morning as it says to do. The test is easy to use and very easy to read. Don't get frustrated if you don't see a peak in less than 9 days.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN INNELLA

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first month!!
customer_reviews.text: Conceived the very first month using these tests! I would 100% recommend. The smiley face makes things so exciting and makes it very easy to tell when you’re ovulating rather than relying on only lines on ovulation strips. I am so glad that we used this test and now have our little one on the way! Good luck to everyone ttc I hope that you get your little love real soon!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU GOD & CLEARBLUE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I promised myself that if these worked for me I would write a review to help anyone out there debating purchasing these. I am currently pregnant thanks to these amazing ovulation tests! I became pregnant my first time/month using these tests!!!! Worth every single penny. Prayers & baby dust to all the woman out there who are trying to conceive!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: With 1 box, I had 12 days of flashing smiley face, never got a solid smiley face. With another box, never got a smiley face, flashing or solid. I thought these would be better than the stripes because it takes away the guessing game with stripes & reads it for you but these do not read properly. And you cannot use stripes/testers from another box with the another reader, so because of that i have several readers with like 4 testing stripes because 4 testers aint enough to track my 30-42day cycle
customer_reviews.author: Pamela O

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Rest!
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying to get pregnant with the cheap ovulation tests bought off Amazon for 4 months ! I had no luck. Then I decided to spend a little extra money and try the ClearBlue ovulation tests! After the first 2 tests I found out I was ovulating. A couple weeks later I took a pregnancy test and found out I’m pregnant! Turns out my ovulation app and the previous tests weren’t telling me the right ovulation date! This test told me exactly when I was ovulating and as a result, im pregnant. I would definitely recommend buying this product! I’ve already suggested it to friends!
customer_reviews.author: MC Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchesed one package of this. The first time I used this, it worked. It was simple & easy to use. The second time, the reader would.not work correctly & displayed the error symbol. Each time there after that I attempted to use this the reader would only display error. Perhaps I had a defective reader? For me, this ended up being a waste of money. I am very disappointed with this product. (October 2018)
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Detected high but not peak fertility when wondfo strips were positive
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this test didn't detect ovulation for me, while my wondfo LH strips did. I think the problem lies in the difference in test time- this test wants first morning urine which is better at detecting estrogen amounts. However, LH is highest from 10am-8pm. So my wondfo LH strips were positive at 12:30 and 8:00 pm even though this test showed only high fertility, not peak, that morning and the next morning. So although it might be good at detecting high fertility, I think you need to test more than just when you wake up to get a peak fertility sign.
customer_reviews.author: ktdyd4

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and both times it showed inaccurate ovulation times. I had bought the LH test strips, clear blue stick that has a pink button and bought the $159 digital ovulation monitor, all these three showed no LH surge and this stick showed ovulation :/ I wouldn’t depend on this alone people. Not very accurate
customer_reviews.author: Onnaseattle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but it works.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for 3 months now and I am happy with them, they do their job. I also use cheap opks and temp too. Even though they're pretty pricey, they help confirm impending ovulation and line up perfectly with my fertility chart and cheap opks. They are pretty accurate, even with my cycle being wonky from time to time. Sometimes it's hard being able to tell if the lines are dark enough on certain opks, so it's nice to have something as simple as a smiley face pop up. I've also found cheaper replacement tests on eBay too, if you don't want to buy the entire kit again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a smiley
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as we are trying to conceive. The reason for four stars is that the price is very high for the quantity. The first month was very frustrating as I never got a smiley face which means I did not ovulate. We are on month two and I finally got a smiley face and I used another brand as well to confirm. This product does work. I do believe it’s always possible to buy a faulty one. Keep trying. If this is too expensive, try a more cost effective brand. Positive thoughts and vibes to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Burk

customer_reviews.title: Easy Directions
customer_reviews.text: I started using these monthly to test for ovulation. I used these back in 2012 and immediately got pregnant with my first child when having intercourse around smiley time. This time around, I've had smileys seven months in a row and no luck. The directions are clear and easy to follow - you urinate on the stick starting around CD9 (for me) and keep using them daily until you get a smiley. Once you have a smiley, there's no need to keep testing - just get moving! It takes about 1 minute for a result to show. You'll get either the blank circle or smiley face. I typically get a smiley on CD13/14.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Test twice a day after your first flashing Smiley!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. First month only tested 1x a day & missed LH surge but STILL got pregnant. Unfortunately had low progesterone & chemical pregnancy was the outcome. Second month started testing am & pm after first flashing Smiley and got my static smiley in the evening on a 4 hr hold. Got my BFP today, 11dpo. They worked for me both months.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Worked on the first try! Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I've been charting and tracking my cycle for around 2 years now. When my husband and I decided to try and get pregnant, we were curious if my charting was correct by purchasing this ovulation test. It wound up being spot on with my own data. We wound up using only about 5 of the strips in the package and we got pregnant right away. I highly recommend this product for anyone trying to take the guessing game out of your monthly cycle. It was also very easy use and follow the instructions. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for smileys!
customer_reviews.text: They work! Just a word to the nervous ttc people out there, sometimes the ovulation trackers on your phone or online will say you’re going to ovulate WAYYY before you actually do. I got a smiley 5 days after I was “supposed” to. Every cycle is different and your best chances of conceiving are during your LH surge. So, if you’re not getting a smiley, just keep peeing on the sticks—even after you think your window has closed. These things work just give them a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate. It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works Everytime, it is accurate and shows the exact ovulation day. I got pregnant the first month trying. I've been use it for 5 month after my mc and it is also accurate. Start using it like 2 days before your ovulation day (mine on on cd 13, so I start on the 11), usually I got 2 negatives until the positive one, so I stop using them as indicated. Once is positive, you will ovulate in the next 36 hours.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Constant error messages
customer_reviews.text: I have been using opks in general for over a year. I decided to try these in addition to the normal ones I use as my husband and I are having an iui done this week, so it's imperative I get an accurate read on my lh surge. I have used 5 of these so far and 3 have come up with errors after using them exactly as the instructions state. I don't know if I received a bad batch or if this is how they always are, but I cannot recommend them based on my results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all I got one that was definitely defective, all it does is keep blinking. I contacted Amazon and they gave me a full refund, I’m going to get a different brand at the store. Good luck to everyone who’s trying for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TEST IS DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the box, and it is saying that I need to buy a new test stick. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Tardif

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to read and use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to read and use! I purchased these and used them for just one cycle and got pregnant right after! It's important to know when you're ovulating if you're trying to conceive and this left no possible chance for error. I was using an app to predict and it turns out it was 3 days off, so I am glad I invested and have a little one on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: I peed on these sticks for about 6 months to track my ovulation while documenting with a free app on my phone (period tracker). At first I used more sticks to narrow down my window of ovulation as what Clearblue instructions say and what my app was saying. About 4 months in, I could use about 3-5 sticks and nail down the ovulation day (or a solid smiley as the stick reads). Anyway, we got a solid smiley, did the deed, and I am 8.5 months pregnant now (note recommendations of when to fertilize vary, this is just my real-life story). Highly recommend this product for ease, accuracy, and value for money. Wish you success Mammas-to-be!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed some hope that I am fertile and able to get pregnant. Now I have it!! So far I got 1 low fertility and 2 days of flashing face so I hope to get a peak tomorrow when I wake up and test. I'll update later. But yes so easy to use and read I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maile

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant Within Two Months
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were trying on and off for a bit less than a year. Used this for two months and I'm pregnant! I was tracking ovulation with an app prior and it was not always accurate. These were easy to use and clearly worked. I didn't even use up all of the tests in the box before becoming pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING...WORKED ON THE FIRST CYCLE TRY
customer_reviews.text: Prior to using the Clear Blue Ovulation Kit I was using an online ovulation calculator, which was making me miss my fertile window. When I used the ovulation kit, I learned that I was ovulating earlier (Cycle day 10/11) than I thought. I got my BFP today after using the ovulation kit ONCE!! I'm still in shock.....I would recommend this product a thousand times over!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Idk about acurracy.. worked the first time though.
customer_reviews.text: First time using i got about 5 high fertility days and then a peak. Second time using i got about 9 high fertility days, decided to try the other test stick i had and it said low fertility. I waited about 3 days and used the same stick as the first time and got low fertility. I think i never got peak so it just kept saying high fertility waiting on peak.
customer_reviews.author: Holl

customer_reviews.title: Best on market
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband are ttc and are seeing a a RE. I had a appt Sunday Morning for blood work and ultrasound. Took one of these and it was negative. After blood work 2 hours later was called with results, was told I was surging. Told myself Noway. Went ahead and performed another an I had a flashing smiley face. Confirmed that these are accurate!!
customer_reviews.author: Yamilette Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Hole in one
customer_reviews.text: It is the second pregnancy I've used these for, and got pregnant in the first month of trying, by having sex just once that month. Daddy was proud to have a hole-in-one baby. Last time it took just two months...really good product!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first month for us and our best friends!
customer_reviews.text: We are pregnant after using these for the first month! Before we were using cheap testing strips and getting unclear readings. Cant mess up with these test. We recommended them to a friend who also got pregnant her first month using these!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: These are good opks -  but take practice to understand fully
customer_reviews.text: These are great once you understand how to use them and what it is they are actually doing. They measure an LH increase (not just quantity of LH like other opks) , so you almost always start at low as the test device is getting a base, so make sure to test early enough in your cycle so that you don't miss a peak day. If you stop testing before you get a peak smiley the test device doesn't reset from what I understand, so your next cycle could be measured inaccurately. So if you don't receive a peak I would contact Clear blue easy.
customer_reviews.author: kimber

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant first month of use
customer_reviews.text: I was using cheapy ovulation tests and diligently tracking my ovulation, but it had been months and I still wasn't pregnant. The first month I used these digital opks I became pregnant! They are easy to use, reliable, and most importantly, easy to read and understand. I would recommend these to anyone trying to conceive!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend only for people with fairly predictable cycles
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent ovulation test. But I think this one is best suited for people with very predictable menstrual cycles. It may not be the best for people with irregular cycles. It helps to start narrowing down & pinpointing fertile days but there is still quite a bit of guesswork involved. I personally did not have success getting pregnant with this product. I recommend people that are having a lot more trouble figuring out their cycles to use ClearBlue Digital Ovulation test. More expensive but way less guesswork because there’s only two possible test results. Otherwise, if your cycles are consistent, I would say this product should help you tremendously in your journey to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Herres

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one by accident and decided to use it anyway. Bad bad idea.. This damn thing has been flashing a smiley face for 2 weeks. My fertility doctor even told me not to get this one. They recomend the other clear blue one which is what I thought I bought. Dont buy this. Track your ovulation with an app and then use the other one at day 10 or 12.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Evans

customer_reviews.title: Clear results
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t to try this brand after my physician recommended it. This test detect my LH surge results compared other brands that weren’t consistent. The results were very clear. I even did another test while doing this one and this showed the LH surge while the other brand was confusing. Some days there were errors during estrogen/ high fertility readings so I wasn’t sure about results but that may have been an error on my part. I had to wait until the next day to test because of lack of flexibility on my schedule
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clearblue vs premom
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with clearblue. It is easy to use and very accurate. I compared this product to the premom ovulation strips. I love both products. Clear blue is straight forward, it is yes or no. However it won't tell you or store your history to know how close ovulation is. You can look at the strips and manually detect the changes. The darker line shows you closer to peak LH. Compared to the premom, I prefer premom. Premom gives you an actual level to compare to. On peak LH, both premom and clear blue indicated peak at the same time. Premom stores history and allows you to compare every month. It is also less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the first time this month. Started testing on day 6 as directed. Got the blank circle for days 6-9, a smiley on day 10 morning, and as recommended by other users, tested again in the afternoon and had a blinking smiley. Not far enough in to the cycle to get a bfp, but was glad with how well the test worked. It seems to line up well with the fertility apps that I use and I think it will be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Conceived right away!
customer_reviews.text: This is so wonderful. I had been using an for a long time to try and track my periods and ovulation period and we weren’t able to get pregnant. The first one I got this kit, we got pregnant! It was super exciting. It is indeed very accurate and takes the guess work out of common apps that just don’t do the job quite as well. I do however recommend seeing a doctor to make sure you and your partner check out in the fertility department first if you’ve been trying for a while. This was one of many steps we took! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nadja

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! Make sure you test in the morning and at night before 8:00pm to be sure! I tested on cycle day 17 in the morning at 6:00am and got a negative & texted at 7:00pm and got a positive.. I Wish babies on everyone! I will update my review if I get a positive pregnancy test 🤞🏾
customer_reviews.author: Lavonta

customer_reviews.title: Took the stress away.
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these in the hope it would take the stress out of " is the line as dark or darker than the control line". Let me tell you it was one of the best choices I made. In regards to the test themselves, I did change up the directions a little by taking the cap off before placing the strip in the monitor and peeing. I found it to be much easier than trying to take the cap off after I placed the strip in the monitor. After just two months of using them we got our BFP. So in the end I would say sometimes paying a little more is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Either got faulty stick or it only works 30% of the time
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions to a T (and was previously using Clearblue OPKs) but either I got a faulty test stick or this product doesn’t work most of the time. When it decides to work it’s fine, but the rest of the time it either doesn’t ever start flashing to read the test or it comes back saying there’s a testing error. I don’t do anything differently between the times it works and the times it doesn’t, so I don’t believe this is user error at this point. I got this to reduce stress while trying to conceive but honestly it’s more of a headache than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Used only once and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday for the 1st time - it gave me a happy face (yay!) but that face stayed forever - no matter what I do it stays that way. I removed the strip right after the happy face was displayed. Wasted another strip just to see if it would change if I tested again - but nothing. The darn thing just keeps smiling ha! Well - not sure about the accuracy BUT I should know in 4 weeks :-)
customer_reviews.author: Online_shopper1000

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: My results were weird and my "peak day" lasted 3 days followed by "high fertility" for 2 days and either way I didn't end up pregnant so I think I got a bad batch or something
customer_reviews.author: Emmaly

customer_reviews.title: Great for irregular cycles!
customer_reviews.text: This is a God send for women with irregular periods. The app on my phone I use to track my cycle was always off on my peak days, but I have anywhere between 29-35 day cycles. This took the guessing out and I am now 6 weeks along. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: OMG 😱 it workssss
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the product would not work but I decided to buy it and try it. I'll tell you, I got my period on August 22nd and it stopped on the 25th. I decided to do the ovulation test on September 1st and that same day I got Peak Fertility yeah I did what I had to do 😁 after all I waited until my next period and I was late for 6 days and I took the pregnancy test on September 28 and what do you think 😱 We are expecting our 2nd baby 😍
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant first month using!
customer_reviews.text: Pregnant first month using this! Couldn’t be happier! Used this along with pregmate and both gave same results! Took almost a year to get pregnant with my son so I wanted to be proactive and so happy I was!
customer_reviews.author: Kay B

customer_reviews.title: Hard to understand instruction
customer_reviews.text: Instruction is hard to understand. I have to purchase other brand to test.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I got these tests a few months ago in hopes that it could help track my ovulation when my period started again after birth control. When I started testing for ovulation regularly I used cheap strips before I would take one of these digital tests. When I got my first positive ovulation strip test I took a digital test from this product to double check the results and the digital was negative. I have reason to believe that my strip was the correct result because I had multiple positive results from the strips but never got a positive result from my clear blue digital test. I wouldn’t bother wasting your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: For a cheaper digital test, this was very accurate. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I need to track my ovulation and these were the cheapest. Although they are incredibly accurate and easy to use, there are others that are easier and more accurate now that technology has advanced. This month I will try to use another type of test and see if it says something different. But if you are on a fixed budget and need some tests, these absolutely do work. You just have to read the instructions carefully and know what you’re doing.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Belle

customer_reviews.title: Ovulation predictor
customer_reviews.text: Giving these a 1 star as they are not the best predictor of ovulation and especially for the price. If you have a very regular and completely normal cycle these might work for you, but if you have any irregularity I wouldn’t recommend these as once it detects any LH surge it will immediately report high or peak fertility..if you only had 1 really good, fertile day it would not drop back down to “low” fertility...I think there are better options on the market for less too.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not pick up the time I ovulated. My OB office confirmed I did ovulate, however, this test gave me negatives the time I was supposed to be ovulating. Really disheartening considering I was using this opk in conjunction with fertility medications to induce ovulation. I didn’t think my treatment was working but it was clear blue ovulation kit that was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel Button

customer_reviews.title: Learned I ovulate a week after I thought!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I thought that I ovulated on day 12 of my cycle and luckily got my first two kids thinking this. We had been struggling for a few months to have a third, so I decided to try an ovulation test. I learned I actually don’t ovulate until day 19.
customer_reviews.author: HuskyPup840

customer_reviews.title: Terrible test- almost missed my fertile window
customer_reviews.text: Extremely frustrated. I put trust into this test after researching many tests. I wasted 7 sticks and 2 days sticks just to get one inaccurate reading. I followed the exact instructions. It’s so disappointing to put trust into a product that is supposed to help with a process that is to help alleviate disappointments faced when TTC. I ended having to overnight another brand (Premom) which worked perfectly. I would have missed my fertile window if I had relied on this test. Complete waste of time and money. Don’t waste your time. Pregmate or Premom sticks work back for a fraction of the price of the clear blue sticks.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: My husband was ovulating?????
customer_reviews.text: This DOESN'T work. It said i was ovulating for 5 days in a row..i got suspicious that it was not working so my husband tried it. Guess what...HE was ovulating. Its a complete scam. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Flashing smiley face with WATER!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 days of showing a flashing smiley face and being very frustrated I looked at these reviews. I decided to try the test using only water like others and still got a flashing smiley face. Had I known this product was so unreliable I would not have purchased. Lesson learned, read reviews before purchasing! I have, however, always gotten an LH surge on their normal OPKs so I will be going back to those if it didn’t work this month!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Device wouldn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product after a miscarriage & was excited to begin tracking my ovulation & trying again. When I got the ok from my dr I went home & decided to try and begin tracking but when I opened the package & inserted the stick the device never turned on, I went to the instruction insert & it referred me to question 19 simply telling me to buy a new one, & that was that. Highly disappointed. Will be buying a different brand tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Three out of five tests did not work. They either flashed briefly after contact with urine or did not flash at all, but showed the symbol of the test and the book.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a circle for two days, a flashing smiley for 8 days and on the 9th day I got a static smiley. The flashing smiley for 8 days did drive me nuts, so I started using another brand of OPKs as well just to make sure. The day I got the static smiley this was another brand with the same sample, so as you can see very accurate! I personally like other OPKs because you can see the progression, but these do work and are very simple to use. A bit on the expensive side though, especially if you have a large number of “high” fertility before peak like I did, because you can’t buy the sticks only.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF $40 SINCE PRODUCT STOPPED WORKING.
customer_reviews.text: I went to use this item today with half the tests remaining, and it stopped working and the screen is frozen. Very upset as I'm sure women who are trying to conceive would understand. Wanted to return it, but apparently the window to return it is closed. So I paid $40 or so for a product that only worked a few times, and I have half a box of tests I cant use. Very upset doesnt even begin to describe how Im feeling. Trying to get pregnant isnt cheap, and this $40 product let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sure it helped much
customer_reviews.text: We tried these a few times, but I'm not convinced I know how to use it properly and they are expensive. There seem to be many ways user error, or just individual hormonal differences could affect these, for example, your LSH surge might be a few hours after you test - not all women peak in the AM. Either way, it did feel good to do something that got us more in touch with my cycle and aware of all the changes that your body undergoes. But ultimately, I'm not sure it helped us get pregnant - although we are pregnant. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Tilson

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! I have struggled with uterine fibroids for years and thought I would never be able to conceive. I most recently had my 3rd fibroid surgery in June. My doctor told me to wait until I had my first period after surgery and then I could try to conceive. I purchased these and used the period tracker app Flo. I looked forward the days leading up to ovulation and then started using the clear blue digital ovulation stick. I tested one day and it said there wasn’t a chance to get pregnant. Tested the next day and received my flashing smiley face. Fast forward to today and I am 6 weeks pregnant! Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Benson’s

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a woman who wants to track your ovulation - this is the product to use. DON'T use the digital version of this. Get this one. It was recommended by both my fertility specialist and OBGYN. It's easy to use and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Used ovulation kit and the complimentary pregnancy test...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to report that I got my first FALSE POSITIVE (ever) with the Clear Blue (CB) pregnancy test that came with this ovulation kit. CB needs to revamp their product, or relabel their accuracy rates (which are clearly misleading). On their website, CB’s explanation for false positives is the possibility of a chemical pregnancy. It was not in my case, since I used CB and another reliable brand at the same time. Both yielded different results. I retested the following day with the same two brands, and both (including CB) were negative. The only explanation for this is a faulty product. This raises questions regarding the accuracy of the ovulation strips, will therefore not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but not for PCOS
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these and have been using them since starting to TTC in Nov 2016. However, I have PCOS and I got my first false positive on them this past cycle. I use these in conjunction with cheap OPKs so that I can test multiple times a day. I got a peak reading on CD 18 and did not ovulate for 8 more days, which was really disappointing. It was my first month with this problem. I think they work well but perhaps not for people with multiple LH surges.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine17

customer_reviews.title: I had bought test strips before and found them them hard to read and annoying to deal with ( you can't drink for 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked SO well. I had bought test strips before and found them them hard to read and annoying to deal with ( you can't drink for 4 hours before testing and you can't do your first urine of the day). With Clearblue Advanced Digital, you test your pee first thing in the morning and you get a clear direct answer. SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: domf

customer_reviews.title: Yep. She's pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected. Not having a thin line to distinguish between a positive or negative was worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Every time I've gotten these, 1/4 of the strips don't seem to work.
customer_reviews.text: I've used several brands of ovulation kits and this one seems to work ok, but almost every time, at least 5 or 6 of the strips don't work. This isn't exactly a cheap product, so if 1/4 of your strips don't work, that really irritates me. Especially if you have been trying to get pregnant for a long time. Would prefer something a little more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Briner

customer_reviews.title: Clearblue > Ovulation Apps
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were trying for about 7-8 months using some app that's supposed to tell you when the woman is most fertile (or her ovulation date or something? Now that I think about I'm actually not sure what it was supposed to do). Anyway, after we bought and tried the Clearblue tests we got pregnant the same month :) For what it's worth, my wife did compare the app date to the date Clearblue told us and they were a couple days apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defected. Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i have been trying to conceive for over a year and are in the middle of doing fertility testing. I decided to do multiple ovulation kits (different brands) because I have a test specific to my date of ovulation. Low and behold the reader part of my stick got stuck on a smiley face for days. Thankfully I used other methods of ovulation testing otherwise I would have needed to wait an entire month just to get this test done. It can get frustrating enough trying to conceive, but to spend $40 to get a defective product. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half of the tests are defective
customer_reviews.text: I love their pregnancy tests but these digital ovulation tests are a waste of money. I have used them several cycles while trying to get pregnant three separate times. They are always defective. Just the past few days I have taken five tests. Of those, three came back with an error reading. These are not difficult to take, I follow the instructions, it’s not rocket science. If it is that difficult to get a stick that you pee on working, then maybe their mechanism is flawed. I couldn’t even give it five starts for “easy to read” because you don’t really know what you supposedly did wrong that gave you the error reading.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Get a better understanding of your ovulation
customer_reviews.text: First off I did NOT get pregnant after using this for one cycle. However, I have a better understanding of how my cycle works. The readings are super easy and at this point I need something straight to the point. My husband and I have been trying for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Video Star

customer_reviews.title: It's a Yes From Me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this test for a month, and ended up pregnant! My fiancee and I had been trying for a few months before I decided to get an ovulation test. I found out my cycle tracker app had me ovulating 4 days earlier than I actually did. We are very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated tests but they dont work
customer_reviews.text: The monitor where you stick tests stopped working on the 3rd test. It just got smiley. The simle would not disappear even if you remove a test and wait for several days. So in not sure where I'm still ovulating or not. I actually read some bar reviews prior to purchase, but I hoped that I would be the one with positive experience. Just buy pregmate cheap and easy to use and no malfunctions. This one is supposedly cool sophisticated test, but the fact is it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Same urine, two test, two different outcomes
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when i ordered my first box of these. But then once i got 3 days of low fertility and 10 days of high fertility without ever hitting my peak inwas a bit sad. So the next month i started testing again. And again i got 3 days of low fertility and im not on day 5 of "high" so then I decided to open the box. Snd tested on the first test and the new test, with the same urine and one came back high and the other came back low. Which makes no sense at all :/ :/ :/ my husband and I just want a baby so freaking bad.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jones

customer_reviews.title: My tap water is allegedly fertile.
customer_reviews.text: Total joke. Been using regular strips for several months and sometimes found them “too close to call” so i figured these would be easier to interpret. After five “high fertility” readings I ran them under tap water. My tap water is also highly fertile. Such a waste of money. Calling the clear blue helpline to report this.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: Ovulation test worked as expected. Got pregnant within 4 months of trying. It took 2 months using this. I would suggest to anyone trying to conceive as it is easy to use and works great. Amazon sells for less than the local store which makes this a great deal too!
customer_reviews.author: Devan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Expecting again!
customer_reviews.text: I have an irregular cycle and with my first pregnancy, it took us two years to conceive. This time around, I didn’t have that much time. I had tried using other ovulation test strips but never got a clear result with them which was very frustrating. I decided to spend a little more and bought this product. After using it through just two cycles we are expecting again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I like using the digital OPK's with my normal dip- strip OPK's. I like these clearblue ones but some months, I get 9 or more "high peak" days and then a "peak" or never a "peak" at all. They do not always match up with my dip-strip OPK's, but I still like using these along with those. I keep buying these in hope of a pregnancy, they are very pricey, but I hope they are worth it. We are on our 7 th month ttc, and I have used the clearblue OPK's for 4 of those months with no luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Drenter

customer_reviews.title: Clear blue digital ovulation kit
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I started a pack in April and I got the flashing smile face but never the solid. So we are trying again so I decided to use both monitors and see what results I would get and for the last 3 days I get 2 different results. 1 has a flashing smile face and the other nothing so I have no ideal which is correct. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: These work!!!
customer_reviews.text: After six months of trying and using an ovulation app with no results I decided to give these a try. After one month of trying using these ovulation sticks I found out I was ovulating at a different time than the app was telling me I was. I also got a BFP and we are now expecting baby# 2!!! I'm so glad I gave these a try and will use them for future pregnancies.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki4756

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It showed I had an LH surge which was later confirmed by an ultrasound 4 days later. We saw a corpus lulteum on vaginal US. But you do have to check twice a day if you don’t wanna miss your surge- one in the morning and one in the evening. It showed negative when I checked morning but showed positive when I checked in the afternoon of the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Martyka

customer_reviews.title: So far 100% accurate
customer_reviews.text: This review is based solely on the accuracy (which is the most important) and the easy to read feature, which are the reasons why I purchased the item. I have a very irregular cycle and my OB GYN recommended this product. So far it has been accurate and I have no complaint, other than wishing for the price of the product to go down. Blinking and static smiley faces are way easier to read than lines (personal preference). It eliminates the guessing game. I have no time or energy for it. It does exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Respondent

customer_reviews.title: Read Instructions
customer_reviews.text: They has been great for me. I did not ready the instruction and messed up the first time but after I read them it was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rubio

customer_reviews.title: They were faulty and didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: They did not work, maybe 1 out of the whole batch was read all the others gave an error. I’m so disappointed as these are not cheap. I don’t recommend buying them. I’d like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Terynitup

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first cycle of using it. I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: We used another ovulation kit our first month TTC and it never gave me a positive test. With this kit I got the flashing smiley face on a Saturday, and a permanent smiley face on Wednesday! This was different than what my app showed and provided great insight. It worked and I am now currently 17 weeks pregnant! Highly recommend for someone who needs assurance or wants to plan out their pregnancy. Remember that once you see a flashing smiley face, your stick will continue to do that until the second hormone is detected!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Guetta

customer_reviews.title: as I was super regular and could use the same timing for consecutive ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped me figure out my cycle, was very simple to use. Only needed for two months, as I was super regular and could use the same timing for consecutive months (it took me a total of 6 months, only used two months of these tests).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: Clearblue Digital Ovulation Predictor Kit, featuring Ovulation Test with digital results, 20 Digital Ovulation Tests
product_meta.description: Style:Digital Ovulation Test (20 Count)The Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test (Prueba de Ovulacion Digital) identifies your 2 best days to get pregnant. The simple urine ovulation test is over 99% accurate at detecting the luteinizing hormone (LH) surge. The optical reader interprets your result and gives you a clear smiley face in the digital display when the LH surge has been detected, so you know this day and the following day are your 2 best days to try for a baby. For women whose cycles are variable, it can be especially challenging to accurately detect the timing of the two best days to get pregnant. A 20 count test kit will give you a higher chance of detecting your most fertile days.
feature_bullets: The Clearblue Ovulation Test identifies your 2 most fertile days, so you can maximize your chances of getting pregnant naturally
Easy to read – unique digital ‘smiley face’ results
The Clearblue Helpline 1-800-321-3279 is available for any questions or concerns
20 Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test Sticks included
The Clearblue Ovulation Test is over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
